docs.snippet: In buying WhatsApp, Facebook is betting that the future of social networking will depend on the ability to quickly and efficiently communicate with your closest confidants....
docs.lead_paragraph: In buying WhatsApp, Facebook is betting that the future of social networking will depend on the ability to quickly and efficiently communicate with your closest confidants.
docs.abstract: Facebook's $19 billion acquisition of WhatsApp amounts to large bet that the future of social networking will turn on quick and efficient communication between close friends rather than endless updates from remote acquaintances; messaging services like WhatsApp use smartphone address books as a simple filter for who matters most in a person's life.

headline.main: WhatsApp Deal Bets on a Few Fewer ‘Friends’
headline.print_headline: WhatsApp Deal Bets on a Few Fewer ‘Friends’
